title: Tibu
author: Tibu
created_time: November 17, 2023, 10:52:46 AMLast edit: November 20, 2023, 08:34:13 AM by Tibu
content: -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The Bitcoin Quiz.Brought to you by Satochip.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------It's Friday, again!But before you head off for a well-deserved weekend away, take the time to test your #Bitcoin knowledge.If you like the quiz, please follow @Satochip on Twitter, retweet and share it.===============================================================================================================================[Quiz 1]===============================================================================================================================Source: https://x.com/satochip/status/1702713265439019081?s=201️⃣ In which year did Satoshi Nakamoto start working on Bitcoin?A) 2006B) 2007C) 2008D) 20092️⃣ Which cryptographic technique is NOT used in the Bitcoin protocol?A) EncryptionB) Digital signatureC) Document timestampingD) Proof of work3️⃣ Under which license is the source code for Bitcoin Core, the main software implementation of #BTC, published?A) BSD LicenseB) GPL LicenseC) AFPL LicenseD) MIT License4️⃣ Who invented the concept of Proof Of Work (POW)?A) David ChaumB) M. Jakobsson & Ari JuelsC) Adam BackD) Cynthia Dwork & Moni Naor5️⃣ Which school of economic thought do bitcoiners often align themselves with?A) Marxist economicsB) Austrian schoolC) Monetarist schoolD) Keynesianism===============================================================================================================================Let's have a try and answer to this topic like: 1️⃣A/2️⃣B/3️⃣C/4️⃣A/5️⃣DSee you next week for another BTC related quiz!  Proudly curated by Satochip.io

comments.author: Tibu
comments.created_time: November 20, 2023, 08:33:36 AMLast edit: November 20, 2023, 09:51:20 AM by Tibu
comments.body: Quote from: chmod755 on November 18, 2023, 06:29:31 AM1️⃣/C2️⃣/C3️⃣/D4️⃣/C5️⃣/BNot that bad... But there are some mistakes.Here are a few hints:1️⃣ ❌ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=13.msg462️⃣ ❌ Knowing that everything is exchanged in clear text... that mean that Bitcoin is not...3️⃣ ✅ Good  See : https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/COPYING4️⃣ ❌ Take a look at the "HashCash" project: http://www.hashcash.org/papers/pvp.pdf5️⃣ ✅ Easy one Come on... I might gift some winners  Nexrt quiz coming soon.

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The Bitcoin Quiz.Brought to you by Satochip.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------It's Friday, again!But before you head off for a well-deserved weekend away, take the time to test your #Bitcoin knowledge.If you like the quiz, please follow @Satochip on Twitter, retweet and share it.===============================================================================================================================[Quiz 2]===============================================================================================================================Source: https://twitter.com/satochip/status/17052564301047279071️⃣ Which email address was indicated on the first page of the Bitcoin whitepaper published on October 31, 2008?A) satoshin@gmail.comB) sat@anonymousspeech.comC) satoshi@vistomail.comD) satoshin@gmx.com2️⃣ What ensures full individual ownership of your bitcoins?A) Your addressesB) Your private keysC) Your public keysD) Your FTX password3️⃣ To which distributed computing problem is Bitcoin mining a solution? The problem of:A) Roman centurionsB) Albanian colonelsC) Byzantine generalsD) Japanese taishos4️⃣  In Bitcoin, a change in consensus rules by hard fork is characterized by its:A) Restrictive natureB) Extensive natureC) Incompatible natureD) Accidental nature5️⃣ What was the first “alternative cryptocurrency”, i.e., the first cryptocurrency to emerge following #BTC?A) PPcoinB) LitecoinC) NamecoinD) Tenebrix===============================================================================================================================Let's have a try and answer to this topic like: 1️⃣A/2️⃣B/3️⃣C/4️⃣A/5️⃣DSee you next week for another BTC related quiz!  Proudly curated by Satochip.io

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: Look like no one cares about this Bitcoin Quiz...

comments.author: ineedhelpplease
comments.body: I'm not expert. Let's just assume all my answers are incorrect.  1️⃣ In which year did Satoshi Nakamoto start working on Bitcoin?D2️⃣ Which cryptographic technique is NOT used in the Bitcoin protocol?C or D (my guess, C)3️⃣ Under which license is the source code for Bitcoin Core, the main software implementation of #BTC, published?Haha no way I'll get this right when I've never heard of these in my lifeA4️⃣ Who invented the concept of Proof Of Work (POW)?Never heard this in my life, expecting it to be wrong too.B5️⃣ Which school of economic thought do bitcoiners often align themselves with?C?

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: Quote from: ineedhelpplease on December 12, 2023, 11:04:37 PMI'm not expert. Let's just assume all my answers are incorrect.  1️⃣ In which year did Satoshi Nakamoto start working on Bitcoin?D2️⃣ Which cryptographic technique is NOT used in the Bitcoin protocol?C or D (my guess, C)3️⃣ Under which license is the source code for Bitcoin Core, the main software implementation of #BTC, published?Haha no way I'll get this right when I've never heard of these in my lifeA4️⃣ Who invented the concept of Proof Of Work (POW)?Never heard this in my life, expecting it to be wrong too.B5️⃣ Which school of economic thought do bitcoiners often align themselves with?C?We are here to learn and progress, right!? That's the purpose of the quiz.And you have... 0 good answer  Try again!

comments.author: LuckySea
comments.body: 1️⃣ C/ 20082️⃣ A/ Encryption3️⃣ D/ MIT License4️⃣ C/ Adam Back5️⃣ B/ Austrian school

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: Quote from: LuckySea on December 15, 2023, 12:47:16 PM1️⃣ C/ 20082️⃣ A/ Encryption3️⃣ D/ MIT License4️⃣ C/ Adam Back5️⃣ B/ Austrian school1️⃣ It's erlier 2️⃣ Bingo! A lot of people think that Bitcoin is encrypted... And it's not.3️⃣ Bingo!4️⃣ Too many people think that Adam is the inventor of POW... But he just used it in his researchs.5️⃣ Bingo!Oh... And take also a look at the second quiz.
